ModMetaData.name: Export Agency
ModMetaData.author: erdelf
ModMetaData.description: You ever get tired of setting up bills, outfits, storage settings etc. every new game ? Well then this mod is for you! Features: • Export bills from any production [1] • Import bills from any production[2] • Export Store zone settings. • Import Store zone settings. [2] • All Outfits and Drug policies are shared accross Colonies using mod <[3]> 1: Button does not display unless bills are populated. 2: Button does not display unless previous export(s) exist. 3: Must have at least loaded game with mod and edited config to ensure config saves. Contributors: • Halno (Textures and Preview image) Version: 1.0.1
